ComicInfo.Summary: In the future everyone on Earth Z has been killed but Iron Man [Jim Rhodes]. The Zombie Universeâ€™s Spider-Man has managed to survive and teams up with Iron Man, zombie Wolverine and zombie Hulk to attack the surviving zombies. During their battle the Watcher appears and everyone ends up destroyed but the Sentry and Uatu. He claims to contain the Sentry so that he never ends up contaminating anyone.
ComicInfo.Title: The Avengers Dismembered
